description.jp:
武門の名家ベオルブ家の末弟で
「北天騎士団」の士官候補生。いかなる
理由があろうとも 他人を犠牲にするこ
とをいとう一途な正義感の持ち主。最愛
の妹アルマを救うためグレバドス教会
らの策謀に立ち向かい「獅子戦争」に
おける影の英雄として活躍した。
description.gl: A squire in the Order of the Northern Sky who was born into House Beoulve、 a respected noble family that serves the kingdom. His belief that one should never sacrifice another's life stems from his strong moral compass. He is the unknown hero of the War of the Lions who stood against the Church of Glabados to save his beloved sister、 Alma.

jp.text: 利用されるだけの人生なんて\nまっぴらだッ！！
目の前で困っている人間を\n放っておけるかッ！
争いを起こさなくたって\nどこかに解決策があるはずだ！
剣を棄て 戦いをやめ\n話し合おう！
大切なのは\nどう生きるかなんだ……
自分の力で勝ち取らない「自由」に\n何の意味がある？
僕は兄さんたちとは違う！

gl.text: I will not be made a puppet!
I would never turn my back on a man beset!
There are ways to heal a festered wound without the knife. The poison can be drawn!
Sheathe your blade、 and let us talk!
We are the sum of our deeds、 not our names.
You think freedom a thing bought and sold? What value、 a freedom you have not earned?
I am my father's son、 but that does not make me the same as my brothers!

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Galvanize (C)]
• Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 20%
• Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• [ATK Up], [BRV Regen] duration +2

「おうえん【C】」使用時
・攻撃力依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・加算したBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限はそれぞれの最大BRVの120％分
・「攻撃力中アップ」「BRVリジェネ」の2ACTION期間延長

desc.en:
[Shout] use +1

When using [Shout]
• Target: Inflicts BREAK
• [Shout] buff becomes level based; grants 1 level of [Shout] (limit 3)
• [Shout] buff effects +10% (does not increase based on level)
• Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 50%
• Triggers follow-up attack
　∟ 3-HIT melee BRV attack + HP attack (60% per hit)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Lowers Action Delay by 4

While [Shout] is at 1 level
• [HP Attack] becomes [HP Attack+]
　∟ Increases own BRV by 70% of Attack
　∟ HP attack

While [Shout] is at 2 levels
• [HP Attack+] becomes [HP Attack++]
　∟ Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 10%

While [Shout] is at 3 levels
• [HP Attack++] becomes [HP Attack+++]
　∟ Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 20%
　∟ Melee BRV attack + HP attack (BRV potency 100%)
　∟ Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
　∟ Does not increase turn count
　∟ Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
desc.jp:
「さけぶ」の使用回数＋1

「さけぶ」使用時
・BRV加算前にターゲットをブレイク
・強化効果「さけぶ」が段階化し1段階付与（上限3）に変化
・強化効果「さけぶ」の効果小アップ
　段階に応じて効果は変動しない
・攻撃力依存のBRV加算量中アップ
・使用後 ターゲットに以下の行動が追加発動
　-3HIT近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　-奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　 上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・行動負荷ダウン

強化効果「さけぶ」1段階付与中
通常「HP攻撃」が以下の「HP攻撃＋」に変化
・HP攻撃前に自身に
　自身の攻撃力に依存した量のBRV加算

「HP攻撃＋」が「HP攻撃＋＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・攻撃力依存のBRV加算量小アップ

強化効果「さけぶ」3段階付与中
「HP攻撃＋＋」が「HP攻撃＋＋＋」に変化し
以下の効果が追加
・攻撃力依存のBRV加算量小アップ
・攻撃力に依存したBRV加算後に
　近距離物理BRV攻撃を追加

　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・総ACTION数に加算されない
　バーストモード中 召喚中およびフレンドサポートの残りACTIONは消費される

desc.en:
[Galvanize] use +2

When using [Galvanize]
• [ATK Up], [BRV Regen] effects +20%
• Self: 6 turns 1 level of [Pep] (raises party's MAX BRV by 60%, ATK by 20%; limit 3)
• Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 20%
• Recovers party's HP by 20% of individual Max HP
• Lowers Action Delay by 4

While [Pep] is at 1 level
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Increases party's BRV by 40% of Attack
　∟ Recovers party's HP by 50% of BRV damage dealt (limit 10% of Max HP)

While [Pep] is at 2 levels
• [BRV Attack+] becomes [BRV Attack++]
　∟ Increases BRV potency by 20%
　∟ Lowers Action Delay to 27
　∟ Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 10%

While [Pep] is at 3 levels
• Granted buffs duration +3 when using [Galvanize]
• [BRV Attack++] becomes [BRV Attack+++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2
　∟ Increases total BRV potency by 20%
　∟ Lowers Action Delay to 24
　∟ Increases BRV gain based on Attack by 20%

desc.en:
When using [Enervate], [Enervate+], [Enervate++], [Enervate+++]
• Increases own BRV by 50% of Attack before BRV attack
• Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Increases BRV potency by 120%
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
• Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
• Extends [Enervate] to all targets

When using [BRV Attack+], [BRV Attack++], [BRV Attack+++]
• Increases BRV potency by 20%
• Respectively increases BRV gained based on Attack by 10%, 20%, 30%

When using [BRV Attack+++]
• Does not increase turn count
• Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

When using [HP Attack+], [HP Attack++]
• Respectively increases BRV gained based by Attack by 10%, 20%
• Melee BRV attack + HP attack (respective BRV potency 80%, 120%)
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV

When using [HP Attack+++]
• Increases BRV gained based on Attack by 20%
• Gained BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• BRV attack hit count becomes 2
• Increases total BRV potency by 20%
desc.gl:
When using Enervate, Enervate+, Enervate++, Enervate+++:
 • Increased BRV based on ATK before attack
 • Increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120% based on ATK
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
 • All enemies: Enervate

When using BRV Attack+, BRV Attack++, BRV Attack+++:
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Slightly increased BRV based on ATK

When using BRV Attack+++:
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

When using HP Attack+, HP Attack++, HP Attack+++:
 • Slightly increased BRV based on ATK

When using HP Attack+, HP Attack++:
 • Becomes melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using HP Attack+++:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
